title: Comments Schema
description: The comments for a posts.schema.json resource.

kind.description: The kind of this resource. Always comments.schema.json.

post.description: Data about the post containing this comment.

id.description: The identifier of the post containing this comment.

blog.description: Data about the blog containing this comment

id.description: The identifier of the blog containing this comment.

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time date-time when this comment was published, for example '2012-04-15T19:38:01-07:00'.

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this comment was last updated, for example '2012-04-15T19:43:21-07:00'.

selfLink.description: The Blogger API URL to fetch this resource from.

content.description: The content of the comment, which can include HTML markup.

id.description: The identifier of the comment creator.

url.description: The URL of the comment creator's profile page.

image.description: The container for the creator's avatar URL.

url.description: The URL of the comment creator's avatar image.

inReplyTo.description: Data about the comment this is in reply to.

id.description: The ID of the parent of this comment.
